gameDescription: A V1 Picaro Test-Game, in which an item is used to get another item, which, when used with a third item after the first item has been dropped, wins the game.

Events.message: You're able to catch the leaf on one of the rake's rusty tines and bring it on down.
The cauldron bubbles violently.  The resulting potion cures scabies.
You lean the rake up against the tree.

ActionGuards.failMessage: You can't quite get it.  If only you were holding something that extended your reach...
ActionGuards.successMessage: You reach the rake up and grab the leaf, almost without thinking.

ActionGuards.failMessage: Stonehenge bristles at your temerity, to wield a metal object in its presence.
ActionGuards.successMessage: You place the leaf into the cauldron, and after a slow boil and some ritual mutterings.

Rooms.Name: The Tree
Rooms.Description: You stand at the base of a tree. Its leaves are prized for their medicinal qualities.

Items.Name: Rake
Look: The rake is a bit rusty.

Items.Name: Tree
Look: Looks like one of those trees that might secretly be a forest spirit / grandmother figure.

Rooms.Name: Stonehenge
Rooms.Description: Ancient power fills the air. The stone formation encircles a bubbling cauldron.

Items.Name: Cauldron
Look: Druidic runes glimmer over its surface.
